attacks.name: Cheer Up
attacks.text: Draw a card. If you have Plusle in play, draw 2 cards instead.

attacks.name: Negative Ion
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Power Bolt
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Chain of Events
abilities.text: As long as Minun is your Active Pokémon, whenever your other Active Pokémon, if any, attacks, you may use Cheer On after the first attack (you still need the necessary Energy to use Cheer On). You can't use Cheer On more than once in this way even if your other Active Pokémon has the Chain of Events Poké-Body.

attacks.name: Cheer On
attacks.text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon (including Minun).

attacks.name: Special Circuit
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. If you choose Pokémon that has a Poké-Power or Poké-Body, this attack does 40 damage instead. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to each of those Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Minun

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Tag Team Boost
attacks.text: If Plusle is on your Bench, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

data.flavorText: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.

data.name: Minun

abilities.name: Minus Charge
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if any Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, you may draw 2 cards. You can't use more than 1 Minus Charge Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Minun is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tag Play —
attacks.text: If you have Plusle on your Bench, you may move an Energy card attached to Minun to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

data.name: Minun

abilities.name: Electro-guard
abilities.text: As long Minun has any Lightning Energy attached to it, Minun has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Sniff Out
attacks.text: Put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Negative Spark
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-Bodies. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

data.name: Minun

attacks.name: Negative Discard
attacks.text: Put 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

data.flavorText: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.

attacks.name: Ditch and Draw
attacks.text: You may discard any number of cards from your hand. Then, draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.

data.flavorText: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

attacks.name: Minus Energy
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon. Your opponent returns that card to his or her hand.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Minun

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Lightning Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Trash Charge
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

attacks.name: Drawup Power
attacks.text: Search your deck for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Front Spark
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Minun

abilities.name: Buddy Pulse
abilities.text: If you have Plusle in play, whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card from their hand to 1 of their Pokémon, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon. The effect of Buddy Pulse doesn't stack.

data.flavorText: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.
